Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time spent on 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average resolution time of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time between 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total resolution time for cases involving 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' before 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average waiting time before 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' after 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases that are eventually approved
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time it takes from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Payment Handled' in all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time to re-submit after 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time for all activities to be completed after 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case
